name: fusion2-bifpn
Command: cd ~/code/yolov5/;~/miniconda3/envs/yolov5/bin/python -m torch.distributed.run --nproc_per_node 4 train.py --batch 64 --img 1280 --epochs 150 --data data/qianhai_clean_add0616_public_bdd100k.yaml --weights '' --hyp data/hyps/hyp.qianhai-high.yaml --cfg models/qianhai_yolov5m_bifpn.yaml --sync-bn --sorted-iou --device 0,1,2,3 --name fusion2-bifpn --exist-ok
